attributes.action: Enquiry into BBC for political bias
attributes.background:
On BBC question time panellist from the out campaign are always outnumbered by panellist supporting the in campaign normally by 4 to 1. In the general election they were totally biased against UKIP.
THEY ARE SUPPOSED TO BE IMPARTIAL and so they should be.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which include complaints about political bias.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
